dcterms:description: A dataset for real-time 3D reconstruction and interaction using a moving depth camera, providing raw point clouds for benchmarking normal estimation methods.
dcterms:title: Kinect Fusion Dataset

dcterms:description: A 3D mobile laser scanner dataset for benchmarking urban detection, segmentation, and classification methods, containing street scene point clouds.
